Title: All Weapons Red
Plot: As the re-election battles heat up the four senators travel to Afghanistan as part of a Congressional Delegation.
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
GuestStars: Yara Martinez, Wanda Sykes, Julie White, Haley Joel Osment, Chance Kelly, Alicia Sable, Brooke Bloom, Kobi Libii, Bjorn Dupaty, Matty Blake, Molly Kate Bernard, Natalie Gold, Andre Ware, Alex Hernandez, Tom Walker
